Structs/AnyConstraint.html#/s:17Validati.name: InputType
Structs/AnyConstraint.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the constraint can be evaluated with.

Structs/AnyConstraint.html#/s:17Validati.name: init(_:)
Structs/AnyConstraint.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Creates a type-erased Constraint that wraps the given instance.

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: count
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Returns the number of constraints in collection

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: init(constraints:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Create a new ConstraintSet instance populated with a predefined list of Constraints

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: init(constraints:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Create a new ConstraintSet instance populated with a unsized list of Constraints

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: add(constraint:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Adds a Constraint to the generic collection of constraints.

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: evaluateAny(input:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Evaluates the input on all Constraints until the first fails.

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: evaluateAll(input:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Evaluates the input on all `Constraints in the collection.

Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.name: add(predicate:error:)
Structs/ConstraintSet.html#/s:17Validati.abstract: Builds a PredicateConstraint instance and adds it to the generic collection of constraints.

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: count
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Returns the number of constraints in collection

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: init(constraints:)
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Create a new AsyncConstraintSet instance populated with a predefined list of AsyncConstraints

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: init(constraints:)
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Create a new AsyncConstraintSet instance populated with a unsized list of AsyncConstraints

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: add(constraint:)
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Adds a AsyncConstraint to the generic collection of constraints.

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: evaluateAny(input:queue:completionHandler:)
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates the input on all AsyncConstraints until the first fails.

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.name: evaluateAll(input:queue:completionHandler:)
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates the input on all AsyncConstraints in the collection.

Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.name: InputType
Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the constraint can be evaluated with.

Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.name: init(_:)
Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Creates a type-erased AsyncConstraint that wraps the given instance.

Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Structs/AnyAsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Val.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates the input on the provided queue.

Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html.name: AsyncConstraintSet
Structs/AsyncConstraintSet.html.abstract: A generic collection of AsyncConstraints on which an input can be validated on.

Structs/ConstraintSet.html.name: ConstraintSet
Structs/ConstraintSet.html.abstract: A generic collection of Constraints on which an input can be validated on.

Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.name: InputType
Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the predicate can be evaluated with.

Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.name: evaluate(with:)
Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given input matches the conditions specified by the receiver.

Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Protocols/Predicate.html#/s:17Validation.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates whether a given input matches the conditions specified by the receiver, then calls a handler upon completion.

Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Valid.name: InputType
Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Valid.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the predicate can be evaluated with.

Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Valid.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Valid.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates whether a given input matches the conditions specified by the receiver, then calls a handler upon completion.

Protocols/Constraint.html#/s:17Validatio.name: InputType
Protocols/Constraint.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the constraint can be evaluated with.

Protocols/Constraint.html#/s:17Validatio.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Protocols/Constraint.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates the input against the receiver.

Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Vali.name: InputType
Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Vali.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the constraint can be evaluated with.

Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Vali.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html#/s:17Vali.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates the input on the provided queue.

Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html.name: AsyncConstraint
Protocols/AsyncConstraint.html.abstract: The AsyncConstraint protocol is used to define the structre that must be implemented by concrete asynchronous constraints.

Protocols/Constraint.html.name: Constraint
Protocols/Constraint.html.abstract: The Constraint protocol is used to define the structre that must be implemented by concrete constraints.

Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html.name: AsyncPredicate
Protocols/AsyncPredicate.html.abstract: The AsyncPredicate protocol is used to define the structre that must be implemented by concrete async predicates.

Protocols/Predicate.html.name: Predicate
Protocols/Predicate.html.abstract: The Predicate protocol is used to define the structre that must be implemented by concrete predicates.

Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.name: errors
Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.abstract: [Error] if the validation result is .failure, nil otherwise.

Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.name: failingConstraints
Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.abstract: The number of failing constraints for a .failure result, 0 otherwise.

Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.name: hasFailingContraints
Enums/ValidationResult/Summary.html#/s:1.abstract: true if the validation result is .failure, false otherwise.

Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.name: failure(_:)
Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: Validation failed. Contains ValidationResult.Summary that details the cause for failure.

Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.name: isSuccessful
Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: true if the validation result is valid, false otherwise.

Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.name: isFailed
Enums/ValidationResult.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: false if the validation result is .failure or .unevaluated, true otherwise.

Enums/ValidationResult.html.name: ValidationResult
Enums/ValidationResult.html.abstract: A value that represents a successfull or a failed evalutation. In case of failure, it contains a ValidationResult.Summary that summarises the reason behind it.

Classes/URLPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/URLPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given input is a valid URL.

Classes/RegexPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/RegexPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given input matches the regular expression specified by the receiver.

Classes/PairMatchingPredicate.html#/s:17.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/PairMatchingPredicate.html#/s:17.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given pair of values match.

Classes/EmailPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/EmailPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given email is a syntactically valid, according to the RFC 5322 official standard.

Classes/BlockPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/BlockPredicate.html#/s:17Validat.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given input matches the evalutaion closure specified by the receiver.

Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.name: InputType
Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the predicate can be evaluated with.

Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.name: init(_:)
Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: Creates a type-erased Predicate that wraps the given instance.

Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.name: evaluate(with:)
Classes/AnyPredicate.html#/s:17Validatio.abstract: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether a given input matches the conditions specified by the receiver.

Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.name: InputType
Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.abstract: A type that provides information about what kind of values the predicate can be evaluated with.

Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.name: init(_:)
Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.abstract: Creates a type-erased AsyncPredicate that wraps the given instance.

Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.name: evaluate(with:queue:completionHandler:)
Classes/AnyAsyncPredicate.html#/s:17Vali.abstract: Asynchronous evaluates whether a given input matches the conditions specified by the receiver, then calls a handler upon completion.

Classes/ConditionedAsyncConstraint.html.name: ConditionedAsyncConstraint
Classes/ConditionedAsyncConstraint.html.abstract: A structrure that links an AsyncPredicate to an Error that describes why the predicate evaluation has failed.

Classes/ConditionedConstraint.html.name: ConditionedConstraint
Classes/ConditionedConstraint.html.abstract: A data type that links a Predicate to an Error that describes why the predicate evaluation has failed.

Classes/PredicateConstraint.html.name: PredicateConstraint
Classes/PredicateConstraint.html.abstract: A data type that links a Predicate to an Error that describes why the predicate evaluation has failed.

Classes/BlockPredicate.html.name: BlockPredicate
Classes/BlockPredicate.html.abstract: The BlockPredicate class is used to define closure based conditions used to evaluate generic inputs.

Classes/EmailPredicate.html.name: EmailPredicate
Classes/EmailPredicate.html.abstract: The EmailPredicate class is used to evaluate whether a given input is a syntactically valid email address, based on the RFC 5322 official standard.

Classes/PairMatchingPredicate.html.name: PairMatchingPredicate
Classes/PairMatchingPredicate.html.abstract: The PairMatchingPredicate class is used to evaluate whether a given pair of values match.

Classes/RegexPredicate.html.name: RegexPredicate
Classes/RegexPredicate.html.abstract: The RegexPredicate class is used to define regluar expression based conditions used to evaluate input strings.

Classes/URLPredicate.html.name: URLPredicate
Classes/URLPredicate.html.abstract: The URLPredicate class is used to evaluate whether a given input is a syntactically valid URL.
